• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• GENERAL MARKETPLACE CONDUCT • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We are grateful to be able to buy, sell, and trade audio recordings for a living, recirculate the good vibes, and learn new things every day via our work.  Simply put, music makes our world go 'round, and hopefully we can connect via this common ground.  

We have been in business for many years, and most of the time our work is fun work.  That being said, all we ask is that you please approach us with the same kindness we offer to you, and follow Discogs’ Marketplace Guidelines.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• MINIMUM ORDER AMOUNT •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We have a Minimum Order Amount of $30 (before shipping costs).  This applies to all orders.  
No exceptions will be made to this policy.  Offers that don't total at least $30 will be ignored, or declined without explanation.

The reasons for this, are as follows: 

 • We are a very small shop with paid staff.

 • Quality packing/communication takes time. 

 • There are costs associated with doing all aspects of business in general.

 • Discogs has raised their fees, and now apply to shipping costs(!).  They have now mandated PayPal as the only form of payment.  That means that PayPal then applies their criminally high slice to all of the above *including* the Sales Tax / Import Duties you pay. 😕 


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• COMMUNICATION / MESSAGING • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

With the size of our online inventory, and duties of daily operation of a brick & mortar shop, you can imagine we are incredibly busy.  We are happy to help when possible, but when inquiring about an item, please be specific.  Unclear / vague / senselessly unnecessary inquiries often just get unanswered due to the volume of business we do.  Again, we want to help!  So please, help us to help you.

Once an order is placed, to ensure a smooth transaction, (PLEASE) only communicate through Discogs on the Order Message Timeline of your order.  This creates a unified history of communication for our Discogs person, and our shipper.  Failure to communicate in this unified place (Discogs Order Message Timeline) will only complicate and/or delay the process.

Please do not call the shop to inquire about the status of an item or an order.  Discogs stock is separate from shop stock, and shop clerks do not know about Discogs orders.

Thank you for your understanding regarding these matters.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• LOCAL PICK-UP OF ITEMS • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

As per Discogs' policy, all orders must be made through Discogs.  Local pickup of purchases is usually available for all items at our physical brick and mortar shop.  However, stock is not on site so pickup MUST be arranged (AND *confirmed* via the Order Timeline Messages - usually at least one standard business day in advance) through our Discogs person PRIOR to just showing up.  Local Pickup transactions are beneficial to both of us, as we don't have to pack your order, it’s stays out of the postal system, and you don't pay shipping costs.  Shop Local Thru Discogs!

Our shop location: 
JACKNIFE RECORDS & TAPES
3149 Glendale Blvd
Los Angeles (Atwater Village), CA 90039


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• TRADES / BUYING •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

Our Discogs stock is separate from our physical shop.  As such, we do not do trades here, and we will not circumvent the Discogs marketplace.  If you are in the Los Angeles area and have Records, Tapes, CDs, VHS, DVDs, 8-Tracks, Reels, Lasderdiscs, Tees, Memorabilia, etc we buy in shop most days.  For the up-to-date days/times that we buy, please call shop, or check our Instagram bio (@JACKNIFERECORDSANDTAPES).  Requests to do trades here on Discogs will be ignored.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• COMBINED SHIPPING / MERGED ORDERS •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We are more than happy to combine shipping of multiple items in one order.  In these cases, you will pay just the standard amount for the first item, and only a small amount for each additional item when shipped together.  The specific rates are available when viewing our products on Discogs here: https://www.discogs.com/seller/jackniferecordstapes/profile - Just click the "shipping" link after the shipping rate for an item in the Price column (for example, "+$6.00 shipping").  There you will see the shipping rates for additional items.  Please make sure the proper country, or region, is selected from the drop-down menu above.  The additional rate covers time, materials, and labor; this is non-negotiable.

IMPORTANT: If you are looking to combine shipping, please commit to buying all desired items, but DON'T COMPLETE PAYMENT.  Wait for us to merge all items into one order and make only one payment.  Things get complicated when you do not follow these directions.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• LARGE ORDERS + HIGHER PRICED ITEMS •  
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

At our discretion, we reserve the right to require agreement of purchase via approved pictures through email prior to shipping.  As well as the use of Signature Confirmation, USPS Express Mail Shipping, and/or Full Insurance (with Full Valuation), for more expensive items/orders.  Please understand that this can delay the process of a transaction.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• AVAILABILITY OF STOCK •  
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

All items listed are in stock and should be available for shipment.  Once in a great while, an item is misplaced/misfiled.  We are only human - but, we can say that this is a very rare occurrence and has happened only a few times in literally 1000’s of Discogs transactions.  


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• SHIPPING SCHEDULE •  
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We are not Amazon.  We are a very small store that is open daily.  Most aspects of the shop (in addition to Discogs) are handled by a single human being at the moment.   We are simply not equipped to ship every day.  We usually ship once, sometimes twice, per week (based on the orders we receive), after your payment is received.  If you need something shipped faster, please contact us to see if we are able to do so *prior* to purchasing.  We will always do our best, but please remember the above, so we can't guarantee it will be possible.  

Things to consider: 
 • We don't start pulling an order until it's paid for.
 • The larger the order, the longer it will take to fill.  


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• TRACKING • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

All shipments have tracking numbers through the United States Postal Service (USPS).  This is part of the shipping cost that you pay, and is not optional.  Your unique tracking number is provided to you through the "Message" portion of your Order page on Discogs once your order has shipped.  Once tracking is sent to you, an order is considered to be in "Pre-Shipment".  At that time, we have only printed your shipping label and are prepping/packaging your order for shipment.  Receiving a tracking number does not mean the order is has shipped or that it is in the Postal System yet.  Depending on the time of packing, items can drop same day, but usually next business day.  Also note, that sometimes items are packed after hours, or on a Friday, or Saturday, and thus would be dropped one - sometimes two - business days after that.  Again, we are a small organization.  We are doing all we can with the resources we have.  If it's been more than 1-2 business days after you received your tracking number and tracking says "Pre-Shipment" it *usually* means the package just didn't get scanned.  Unfortunately, the USPS seems - increasingly - to not be scanning items into the system in a timely matter, or sometimes not even at all, until delivery(??!??)  Sometimes, packages take a trip *around* The World (??!??) before making it to you.  Obviously, these occurrences are completely out of our control.  Still, the USPS is amazing service, and a crazy value, but nevertheless we are sorry it happens.  However, we ask that you consider this and try to be understanding.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• "MAKE OFFER" FEATURE •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

Most of our items have the "Make Offer" option enabled.  BEFORE making an offer please consider the following: 

We've enabled the "Offer" function primarily for buyers wishing to make larger orders on numerous items in one transaction.  We have thousands, and thousands, of items, and are always adding more - take a look! 👀  From time to time, we accept offers on single items - much more commonly on multiple items at once.  

Additionally: 
• Should we accept your offer, you are committing to purchase an item.  
• If we are already the lowest price on an item with competing offers, please don't waste your time, or ours.  
• We don't disclose the lowest price we will accept for an item.
• Discogs allows the buyer to submit only one offer.  Unlike other marketplaces, there is no counteroffer function here, so don't waste it.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• INSURANCE • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We take packing very seriously - read our feedback: https://www.discogs.com/sell/seller_feedback/jackniferecordstapes
However, at our discretion, we may require you to buy insurance for pricier items, or larger orders.  If this is a concern, please write prior to purchasing.  Remember, we are at the mercy of the USPS, so aside from packing items well, we cannot guarantee they will handle your shipment without insurance.  For our packing practices, see the SHIPPING / PACKING PRACTICES portion below. 


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• STATE SALES TAX (for USA BUYERS) • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

Discogs now adds State Sales Tax to US orders.  Sellers have no way opt out of this.  And - what's even more criminal - realize that we in turn pay fees on the taxes you pay (when you use PayPal), so - as you can imagine - we're super not into it either.  :-/


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• CUSTOMS FEES, IMPORT TAXES • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

As per Discogs' terms: "Buyers are responsible for any and all customs fees, import taxes, or other delivery-related charges once the item has been shipped."  We do not undervalue items.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• RETURNS •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We do not accept returns.  All items sold here on Discogs by us are sold on an “AS IS” basis.  

We grade visually, and conservatively.

We offer a lot of Still Sealed (or "NOS" / "New Old Stock" / "Deadstock") items.  Only the "Media" condition portion of Still Sealed items will be "Mint", not the packaging.  Only unseen items can be assumed "Mint", and as such cannot be guaranteed.  The best packaging can only be "M-", or "NM".

That being said, we are more than happy to try and answer any questions not addressed within these Seller Terms (this page).  If you have any questions that are not answered on this Seller Terms page (that you agree to when purchasing), please make sure to ask PRIOR to purchase.  

Any additional concerns?  Maybe review our feedback here on Discogs: https://www.discogs.com/sell/seller_feedback/jackniferecordstapes

Thank You! :)


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• ORDER CANCELLATIONS •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We do not accept cancellations of orders for any reason.  Make sure to ask all pertinent questions prior to making a purchase, and be sure that you want an item(s) before ordering.  Certainly, once an item is paid for, we do not cancel orders.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• YOUR SHIP-TO / PAYPAL ADDRESS • 
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

As per Discogs' terms: "Buyers are responsible for providing an accurate shipping address.  Buyers are responsible for providing an accurate shipping address. Since payment providers, such as PayPal, will only provide seller protection if the order is shipped to the address listed with the buyer's payment provider, sellers may cancel an order if the buyer's shipping information listed in the Service does not match what is listed with their payment provider. If a seller cancels an order for this reason, they may request Us to remove order feedback."  

This means, orders paid for through PayPal ship ONLY to your confirmed PayPal address, NOT your Discogs address (should it be different).  If your shipment information is incorrect, or incomplete, delays in shipment will likely occur.  If it's not evident that to us that your shipment information is incorrect, or incomplete, and you don't notify us *prior* to shipment, shipments may be held at customs, and/or will be returned to us.  If this happens you will be financially responsible for re-shipment.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• NON-DELIVERY / RETURNED SHIPMENTS •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

International customers especially, take note!  Unclaimed orders, orders returned to us for non-delivery (due to wrong address, missing phone number, etc) are not refunded, rather it is your responsibility to provide an alternate/corrected shipping address, and to pay the new postage.  Items held at customs are - obviously - your responsibility to figure out.  Furthermore, we cannot be held responsible for postal errors (theft, delivery error, etc).  If you're concerned about this, please contact us about insurance.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• SHIPPING / PACKING PRACTICES •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We ship through the United States Postal Service (USPS).  Unless negotiated otherwise, buyer pays all associated shipping costs.

Next to poor grading, we are of the strong belief that there's nothing worse than poor packing.  We're not into wasting your time; or ours.  So, rest assured, all items are packed carefully, and thoughtfully (as indicated by our feedback).  We are not interested in making money on shipping, but there is a baseline for time/materials that are required to make sure things get to you safely - our rates conservatively reflect such.  

More specifically, non-sealed LPs/45s are removed from their outer sleeves to avoid seam splitting.  If there is a custom inner, we put the disc(s) in fresh new inner sleeve(s) to avoid seam splits to the original inner.  We use multiple cardboard filler pads on each side of the LP, and alternate the grain of them for extra strength.  This all costs, but it's worth it.  If you'd like a sealed record to be opened, prior to shipment, please advise us so.  

Cassettes/CDs are wrapped in cardboard and then in a fresh (poly outer) bubble mailer.  These weather the elements the package may encounter on it's journey to you better.

Recycling is super cool, however ... we only use new mailers.  You can re-use them if you like after, but in uncompromised materials are key to getting your items to you safely.  

Please don't pay, and THEN hours/days later ask for an item to be double boxed, for extra bubble wrap, or whatever...  If you have a special request, let us know by writing us a message associated with the order comments AT THE TIME OF ORDER + PAYMENT, and we will try our best to accommodate you.  At that time, we will then assess the situation, and send you a PayPal request to cover the additional time and materials.

All items have tracking, but if you elect not to add insurance, it is at your own risk.  Adding insurance can be done two ways: 

1) prior to payment (we will edit the Discogs invoice by adding insurance to the shipping cost - to do this you must place your order, but not complete payment until we edit the invoice)

2) at the time of payment (you can request insurance in the order messages and we can send an additional payment request)

All that being said, we WILL NOT be held responsible for damage, or loss, to items during transit.  


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• NON-PAYING BUYER CANCELLATION POLICY •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

Once an order is placed, you have four (4) days to complete payment after invoice has been sent.  IMPORTANT: If no payment for an item is made after four days of invoice being sent to you, Discogs will *automatically* leave you a negative feedback, and relist the item for sale to other buyers.  This feedback is not posted by us, but rather an *automated process* posted on our behalf.  If a transaction is completed after this time, we will remove the automatic negative feedback, of course! :)


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• MINIMUM BUYER RATING •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We require you to only have a minimum rating of 90% to purchase from us.

Orders made by buyers with new accounts or accounts with limited history, may require additional information / verification, be cancelled, or limited.

Newbies to this site: Please realize that Discogs uses stock pictures.  In the rare case that we post a picture of the exact copy of an item we are selling, this will be noted in the condition comments of our listing.

• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• CONDITION GRADING •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

Grading of media (especially Vinyl Records) is not everything when buying, but it's ALMOST everything.  To us nothing is more frustrating than misgrading, and then having to go back and contact the seller.  We are all also collectors so we get it.  Unfortunately, Discogs seems, increasingly, to be a marketplace of novice sellers who do not value, understand, or seem to care at all, about grading.  So, we've decided to detail a few aspects about condition here, and how we see it.

Since we list more products than humanly possibly to listen to (play grade), understand that we grade 99% of our items *visually*.  That being said, our approach is to conservatively grade all products.  If you'd like an item play graded, please request us to do so *prior* to placing an order.

There are two condition grades allowed for an item on Discogs.  The first grade is for the "Media", the second grade is for the "Sleeve".  These grades are based in Vinyl Record terminology but can be applied to other formats.  For example, a Cassette's "Media" is the Cassette Tape(s) itself, and the "Sleeve" is the J-Card(s) and other non-"case" art elements.  Likewise, a CD's "Media" is the actual Disc, and the "Sleeve" is the Booklet, Traycard, Digipak, Sleeve, and/or Slipcase, etc.  If all units of Media, or elements of what constitute the "Sleeve" are not in the same condition the lowest element condition is used. 


CASSETTE TAPES:  
Our highest grade for a Still Sealed Cassette is M / NM.  
Our highest grade for an opened CD is NM / NM.
Cassette cases are not graded.  

All cassette tapes have pressure pads in place when listed, and are checked again at time of shipment.  We usually only sell tapes that are visually clean and seem well cared for.  Any exceptions to this are graded conservatively.  Tapes are not play graded so can only be sold as is.  We can only assume that Still Sealed tapes are fully functional - please understand that when purchasing and our AS IS sale policy.


CDs/DVDs:
Our highest grade for a Still Sealed CD is M / NM.  
Our highest grade for an opened CD is NM / NM.
CD cases are not graded.  

We generally only sell CDs with light signs of use.  On the rare occasion, a CD has more wear we will detail its issues in the condition comments.  We can only assume that Still Sealed discs are mint - please understand that when purchasing and our AS IS sale policy.    


8-TRACKS / REEL-TO-REEL TAPES / LASERDISCS / VHS TAPES / etc:
Currently, we do not have the ability to test these formats and are graded visually, and conservatively.  Although our average is very good, as a result, we can’t warranty these items.  We can only assume that Still Sealed items are mint - please understand that when purchasing and our AS IS sale policy.


VINYL RECORDS:
M (Mint):  
As per Discogs: "Absolutely perfect in every way. Certainly never been played. Should be used sparingly as a grade."
For us, the "Mint" grade is exclusive to Still Sealed Items, and (sometimes) for Unplayed Items that were issued unsealed - usually by super indie/boutique labels.  Obviously, one can only assume a Still Sealed item to be mint, but in reality nothing in this world is truly mint.  No, we do not re-seal anything, Ever.  Only flat Still Sealed records are sold.  If we think there's a possibility of a dish warp, we usually open it.  If you want a Still Sealed record opened prior to shipping, please let us know in the Discogs order details at the time of payment.  Although we pack thoughtfully, we will hot be held responsible for seam splits of sealed records.  We can only assume that Still Sealed discs are mint - please understand that when purchasing and our AS IS sale policy.

NM / M- (*NEAR* Mint / Mint Minus):  
As per Discogs: "A nearly perfect record (tape, CD, etc). The record should show no obvious signs of wear."
Aside from new items (issued unsealed), NM / M- is the highest grade a non-still sealed item get from us.  NM / M- items will possibly be unplayed but definitely have little to no wear! 

VG+ (Very Good +):  
As per Discogs: "Will show some signs that it was played and otherwise handled by a previous owner who took good care of it."

VG (Very Good):  
As per Discogs: "Noticeable groove wear and light scratches. Surface noise will not overpower the music."
In our opinion, depending on the type of music, your playback equipment, a VG record will be just fine to most buyers. It won't have scratches you can feel - only surface marks.  

G+ (Good Plus):  
As per Discogs: "Can play without skipping. Significant scratches, surface noise, and groove wear."
A "Good Plus" record is not good.  It's worn, may have scratches you can feel, but it does play, and probably with a lot of noise.  For the most part, we only offer really rare stuff at this grade.

G (Good):  
As per Discogs: "Can play without skipping. Significant scratches, surface noise, and groove wear."
Again, a "Good" record is not good.  It's worn, but it does play, may have scratches you can feel, and probably with a lot of noise.  For the most part, we only offer really rare stuff at this grade.

F (Fair) and P (Poor): Less than 1% of items we sell get this grade, and are usually just used to get your attention.  The comments will detail issues with F, or P, graded items.

• DISCOGS SHIPPING RATE SYSTEM •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

In November 2020, Discogs updated their shipping system.  This new system requires sellers to establish a rate to be applied to every item offered for sale on Discogs.  Problem with this system is that it only specifically addresses five format types: "Large Vinyl", "Small Vinyl", "CDs", "Cassettes" and "DVD/Blu-rays".  This means that any item that is not one of these format types, or is a combination of format types, must have a rate.  These rates that have to be blanket are inaccurate.  So, contact us.


• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 
• DOMESTIC SHIPPING •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

We ship via:

• USPS MEDIA MAIL®  [NOT available to Alaska, Hawaii, FPO/APO] [subject to postal inspection; we WILL NOT be responsible for theft, damage, etc, when the USPS opens your package ... we recommend insurance]

• USPS FIRST-CLASS MAIL®

• USPS PRIORITY MAIL®
[As the Discogs system does not allow us to determine specific rates based on your zip code, and Priority service carries zone-specific pricing, rates are based on what it would take for the farthest zone from us.  If this rate is an issue, make your order, but do not complete payment!  We will adjust payment based on your zone, and send a new invoice.  Once a payment is made, we will not adjust a shipping rate.]  

• USPS EXPRESS MAIL®

As required by Discogs, shipping rates are now assigned to all items.  This system is not perfect.  If something seems high, it's probably because the item is not a format recognized by the rate system. 

The Discogs system currently only addresses five (5) format types: 
[1] "Vinyl (Large)"  (i.e. 12", LPs, etc.)
[2] "Vinyl (Small)"  (i.e. 7", 45's, etc.)
[3] CD
[4] Cassette
[5] DVD/Blu-ray

That means other format types, or combinations of formats, (i.e. 8-Tracks, Shellac, MiniDisc, Reel-To-Reel, DVD-A, an LP+CD, etc.) are NOT recognized and have blanket rates that are obviously incorrect.  Please address concerns PRIOR to purchase.

As per Discogs' terms: 
"Buyers are responsible for any and all customs fees, import taxes, or other delivery-related charges once the item has been shipped."

We do not undervalue items.

Multi-unit/disc sets, records with heavy packaging, etc. usually weigh more and affect total weight. 
For larger amounts, or for additional shipping methods, please write us.

For payment of pricier, rare items, and large orders when using PayPal, CC's, etc (all non-cash payment methods) we are forced to REQUIRE TRACKING & INSURANCE.  This means the use of USPS EXPRESS MAIL with FULL INSURANCE (and thus Full Value Declaration).  Unless you want to pay with USPS Money Order, USD Cash, Venmo, or CashApp, there will be no exceptions on this policy.  Additionally, if paying with PayPal, please note: We are REQUIRED to ship to your PayPal address [NOT YOUR DISCOGS ADDRESS].  Please make sure it's correct!

• FEEDBACK •
• • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • • 

As per Discogs' terms: "If there is a problem related to the order, the buyer or seller will use the order page to notify the other party before leaving feedback. Buyers and sellers will communicate directly with each other to resolve any and all issues via the order page, using professional and courteous language at all times."

Inappropriate feedback includes: 
- Feedback that uses profanity, slander or libelous and insulting language
- Feedback left just to attack the buyer or seller personally
- Feedback with false or inaccurate information
- Feedback used to artificially boost ratings
- Feedback that is left before first trying to find a solution
- Feedback left only to argue feedback received

Full details on Discogs' expected feedback practices are detailed here:
https://support.discogs.com/hc/en-us/articles/360006897173-Buyer-Seller-Feedback-FAQ

seller.shipping:
Flashback Records Seller Terms

_____________

Item locations

To find which store items in our inventory are located in, please check the reference codes of the item as each code contains a letter that corresponds with the store:

C - Crouch End
E - Islington
S - Shoreditch

____________

Mint Condition Vinyl

Please bear in mind that mint condition according to the Discogs grading system does not necessarily mean sealed - most of our mint condition vinyl are removed from the sleeve for security reasons due to selling from a store. All our mint new vinyl records are unplayed.

If you require sealed records please get in touch before placing an order.

_____________

Trading

We can only offer trades on our products in-store. We do not offer any discounts or deals on our online inventory.

_____________
 
Orders and Payments

Please be aware that we sell our stock from our physical stores rather than a warehouse, therefore, stock is sold in-store which can result in our listings not always being updated in time and some items may not be available. In these instances, a full refund will be provided as soon as possible. 

If you require the order to be shipped to another address, please contact us as soon as the order has been made either in the notes or dialog boxes under the order. Please do not order if you do not use Paypal or are having problems with your account - we do not accept bank transfers or over the phone payments.

_____________

Invoice sent orders

If you have not paid for your order within 7 days, we will cancel it and negative feedback will automatically be given.

_____________

Shipping

We aim to process and post out our orders within 1-3 working days. We do not post out orders on weekends or bank holidays. Tracking numbers are not provided with UK Second Class postage. 

We ship to most countries worldwide but please be aware that overseas shipments may be charged additional customs fees which is the responsibility of the customer to pay. 

_____________

Returns

Please contact us if you wish to return an item to us.

In the case of incorrect grading, listing or if the product is defective, we will cover return shipping and full refund of the item price and original shipping costs. We will send you money immediately for the return shipping, and process the full refund once we receive the item back to us in the same condition as we sent it. 

If the item was correctly listed, but you want to return it for another reason, you can return it to us. On receipt of the item back in the same condition as we sent it, we will refund you for the cost of the item only, NOT including original shipping costs or return shipping costs.

If an order has been returned to us by Royal Mail or courier services as 'not called for', the buyer failed to collect it from the post office or the buyer was not present upon delivery, then the buyer is responsible for paying for the re-shipping of the order. We do no cover re-shipping costs in these circumstances. We will contact you to let you know that the order has been returned to us and you will have 7 days to respond if you would like it to be re-shipped. If we don’t receive a response after 7 days, we will refund the order for the cost of the item. 

_____________

Contact

Please contact us at info@flashback.co.uk with any questions or enquiries.

seller.shipping:
ABOUT US
- Flo Records is a bricks-and-mortar record store nestled in Bangalow, in the Byron Shire hinterland (NSW, Australia). We stock an eclectic and curated mix of new and second-hand vinyl, spanning everything from underground classics to overlooked gems. Our collection reflects a love for soulful, electronic, jazz, Balearic, and beyond.
- For best prices, explore more of our catalogue and latest arrivals at: https://www.florecords.com.au/

SELLER TERMS
- Every second-hand record listed on Discogs has been checked, cleaned, and re-sleeved before shipping. We use a ultrasonic cleaning system and high-grade inner sleeves.
- If a record has been on display in-store, we’ll double-check its condition before dispatch. If anything changes from the listed grading, we’ll let you know straight away.
- We do our best to grade records accurately, but if something’s not right, don’t hesitate to reach out—we're happy to review and make it right.
- Orders are typically packed and shipped within 1-2 business days of payment.
- Orders with no payment after 4 business days may be cancelled.

SHIPPING
- We ship Australia-wide and internationally. Delivery times within Australia are generally 3–5 business days. International orders can take 5–10 business days depending on location.
- For the fastest service or special requests (e.g., express or tracked courier), just drop us a message.
- Postage is calculated at checkout using current Australia Post rates. For larger orders (over 2kg or ~8 records), reach out and we’ll check if we can offer a better shipping solution.
- Free shipping is available across Australia for orders over $200.

GET IN TOUCH / FOLLOW US
- Email: hello@florecords.com.au
- Website: https://www.florecords.com.au/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_florecords/

Thanks for supporting independent music culture—see you in the crates!
– Flo Records, Bangalow

Hello dear discogs friend, 

I accept only PayPal regarding discogs general condition and for other payment methods or proposal please contact per email. 
All records or cd are used; some are more than 15 years old!!! It can happen that the sleeve or the inner circle has some writings on it or a sticker; it can also happen that the inner paper sleeve is missing, feel free to contact me before ordering and I'll gladly give you a complete description of the record you're interested in. I'm also interested in swapping vinyls if you have a good proposition. Obviously, double vinyls count as 2, triple as 3, etc...For more than 6 vinyls, please contact me. 
Sometimes, the condition mentioned concerns only the record, not the sleeve. Usually the sleeve is more or less in the same condition e.g. if a record is rated VG, the sleeve should be G+, VG or VG+. However, if a sleeve is really in bad condition or even if the original sleeve is missing, I'll add a note in the description. 
IMPORTANT: please also note that I'm very strict with my grading, which means you'll probably have rather good surprises than bad ones (e.g. I start my grading with VG+ as they're all a few years old, I prefer not to grade them as mint nor near mint). 
Other things:
• Orders unpaid after 7 days will be cancelled
• No responsibility for package sent between 1 to 6 vinyls without register. If you require assurance, please ask for registered shipping
• If you have any unexpected problems with the product, please contact me before to put a negative feedback. We will always try to find a solution. Refund for example.

Allgemeine Geschäftsbedingungen der Firma Riviera Records


§1 Geltung gegenüber Unternehmern und Begriffsdefinitionen

(1) Die nachfolgenden Allgemeinen Geschäftbedingungen gelten für alle Lieferungen zwischen uns und einem Verbraucher in ihrer zum Zeitpunkt der Bestellung gültigen Fassung.



Verbraucher ist jede natürliche Person, die ein Rechtsgeschäft zu Zwecken abschließt, die überwiegend weder ihrer gewerblichen noch ihrer selbständigen beruflichen Tätigkeit zugerechnet werden können (§ 13 BGB).



§2 Zustandekommen eines Vertrages, Speicherung des Vertragstextes

(1) Die folgenden Regelungen über den Vertragsabschluss gelten für Bestellungen über unseren Internetshop https://rivierarecords.de .



(2) Im Falle des Vertragsschlusses kommt der Vertrag mit

zustande.



(3) Die Präsentation der Waren in unserem Internetshop stellen kein rechtlich bindendes Vertragsangebot unsererseits dar, sondern sind nur eine unverbindliche Aufforderungen an den Verbraucher, Waren zu bestellen. Mit der Bestellung der gewünschten Ware gibt der Verbraucher ein für ihn verbindliches Angebot auf Abschluss eines Kaufvertrages ab.



(4) Bei Eingang einer Bestellung in unserem Internetshop gelten folgende Regelungen: Der Verbraucher gibt ein bindendes Vertragsangebot ab, indem er die in unserem Internetshop vorgesehene Bestellprozedur erfolgreich durchläuft.



Die Bestellung erfolgt in folgenden Schritten:



1) Auswahl der gewünschten Ware

2) Bestätigen durch Anklicken der Buttons „Bestellen“

3) Prüfung der Angaben im Warenkorb

4) Betätigung des Buttons „zur Kasse“

5) Anmeldung im Internetshop nach Registrierung und Eingabe der Anmelderangaben (E-Mail-Adresse und Passwort).

6) Nochmalige Prüfung bzw. Berichtigung der jeweiligen eingegebenen Daten.

7) Verbindliche Absendung der Bestellung durch Anklicken des Buttons „Zahlungspflichtig bestellen“ bzw. „kaufen“



Der Verbraucher kann vor dem verbindlichen Absenden der Bestellung durch Betätigen der in dem von ihm verwendeten Internet-Browser enthaltenen „Zurück“-Taste nach Kontrolle seiner Angaben wieder zu der Internetseite gelangen, auf der die Angaben des Kunden erfasst werden und Eingabefehler berichtigen bzw. durch Schließen des Internetbrowsers den Bestellvorgang abbrechen. Wir bestätigen den Eingang der Bestellung unmittelbar durch eine automatisch generierte E-Mail („Auftragsbestätigung“). Mit dieser nehmen wir Ihr Angebot an.



(5) Speicherung des Vertragstextes bei Bestellungen über unseren Internetshop : Wir senden Ihnen die Bestelldaten und unsere AGB per E-Mail zu. Die AGB können Sie jederzeit auch unter https://rivierarecords.de/agb einsehen. Ihre Bestelldaten sind aus Sicherheitsgründen nicht mehr über das Internet zugänglich.



§3 Preise, Versandkosten, Zahlung, Fälligkeit

(1) Die angegebenen Preise enthalten die gesetzliche Umsatzsteuer und sonstige Preisbestandteile. Hinzu kommen etwaige Versandkosten.



(2) Der Verbraucher hat die Möglichkeit der Zahlung per Vorkasse, Nachnahme, Bankeinzug, PayPal, Klarna, Sofort, Kreditkarte( Visa, Mastercard, American Express ) .



(3) Hat der Verbraucher die Zahlung per Vorkasse gewählt, so verpflichtet er sich, den Kaufpreis unverzüglich nach Vertragsschluss zu zahlen.

Soweit wir per Nachnahme liefern, tritt die Fälligkeit der Kaufpreisforderung mit Erhalt der Ware ein.



§4 Lieferung

(1) Sofern wir dies in der Produktbeschreibung nicht deutlich anders angegeben haben, sind alle von uns angebotenen Artikel sofort versandfertig. Die Lieferung erfolgt hier spätesten innerhalb von 5 Werktagen. Dabei beginnt die Frist für die Lieferung im Falle der Zahlung per Vorkasse am Tag nach Zahlungsauftrag an die mit der Überweisung beauftragte Bank und bei allen anderen Zahlungsarten am Tag nach Vertragsschluss zu laufen. Fällt das Fristende auf einen Samstag, Sonntag oder gesetzlichen Feiertag am Lieferort, so endet die Frist am nächsten Werktag.



(2) Die Gefahr des zufälligen Untergangs und der zufälligen Verschlechterung der verkauften Sache geht auch beim Versendungskauf erst mit der Übergabe der Sache an den Käufer auf diesen über.



§5 Eigentumsvorbehalt

Wir behalten uns das Eigentum an der Ware bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung des Kaufpreises vor.



****************************************************************************************************

§6 Widerrufsrecht des Kunden als Verbraucher:

Widerrufsrecht für Verbraucher



Verbrauchern steht ein Widerrufsrecht nach folgender Maßgabe zu, wobei Verbraucher jede natürliche Person ist, die ein Rechtsgeschäft zu Zwecken abschließt, die überwiegend weder ihrer gewerblichen noch ihrer selbständigen beruflichen Tätigkeit zugerechnet werden können:



Widerrufsbelehrung



Widerrufsrecht



Sie haben das Recht, binnen vierzehn Tagen ohne Angabe von Gründen diesen Vertrag zu widerrufen.



Die Widerrufsfrist beträgt vierzehn Tage, ab dem Tag, an dem Sie oder ein von Ihnen benannter Dritter, der nicht der Beförderer ist, die Waren in Besitz genommen haben bzw. hat.



Um Ihr Widerrufsrecht auszuüben, müssen Sie uns

Riviera Records GbR

-Piehler, Hornung, Dewes-

Herzogspitalstraße 7

D-80331 München

E-Mail info@rivierarecords.de

mittels einer eindeutigen Erklärung (z.B. ein mit der Post versandter Brief, Telefax oder E-Mail) über Ihren Entschluss, diesen Vertrag zu widerrufen, informieren. Sie können dafür das beigefügte Muster-Widerrufsformular verwenden, das jedoch nicht vorgeschrieben ist.



Widerrufsfolgen



Wenn Sie diesen Vertrag widerrufen, haben wir Ihnen alle Zahlungen, die wir von Ihnen erhalten haben, einschließlich der Lieferkosten (mit Ausnahme der zusätzlichen Kosten, die sich daraus ergeben, dass Sie eine andere Art der Lieferung als die von uns angebotene, günstigste Standardlieferung gewählt haben), unverzüglich und spätestens binnen vierzehn Tagen ab dem Tag zurückzuzahlen, an dem die Mitteilung über Ihren Widerruf dieses Vertrags bei uns eingegangen ist. Für diese Rückzahlung verwenden wir dasselbe Zahlungsmittel, das Sie bei der ursprünglichen Transaktion eingesetzt haben, es sei denn, mit Ihnen wurde ausdrücklich etwas anderes vereinbart; in keinem Fall werden Ihnen wegen dieser Rückzahlung Entgelte berechnet.



Wir können die Rückzahlung verweigern, bis wir die Waren wieder zurückerhalten haben oder bis Sie den Nachweis erbracht haben, dass Sie die Waren zurückgesandt haben, je nachdem, welches der frühere Zeitpunkt ist.



Sie haben die Waren unverzüglich und in jedem Fall spätestens binnen vierzehn Tagen ab dem Tag, an dem Sie uns über den Widerruf dieses Vertrages unterrichten, an uns zurückzusenden oder zu übergeben. Die Frist ist gewahrt, wenn Sie die Waren vor Ablauf der Frist von vierzehn Tagen absenden.



Sie tragen die unmittelbaren Kosten der Rücksendung der Waren.



Finanzierte Geschäfte



Haben Sie diesen Vertrag durch ein Darlehen finanziert und widerrufen Sie den finanzierten Vertrag, sind Sie auch an den Darlehensvertrag nicht mehr gebunden, wenn beide Verträge eine wirtschaftliche Einheit bilden.
